code: import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import React from'react';import{Pagination}from"react-bootstrap";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{setPage}from"../redux/actions";var MAX_PAGES=205;var PageNav=function PageNav(){var page=useSelector(function(state){return state.page.page;});var dispatch=useDispatch();var getNumPagesBefore=function getNumPagesBefore(){if(page<6){return page-1;}return 5;};var getNumPagesAfter=function getNumPagesAfter(){if(page>200){return MAX_PAGES-page;}return 5;};var getPageNum=function getPageNum(i){if(page>=6){return page+(i+1-6);}return page+(i+1-page);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"d-flex",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Pagination,{className:"mx-auto",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pagination.First,{onClick:function onClick(){return dispatch(setPage(1));}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pagination.Prev,{disabled:page===1,onClick:function onClick(){return dispatch(setPage(page-1));}}),Array(getNumPagesBefore()).fill(0).map(function(e,i){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pagination.Item,{onClick:function onClick(){return dispatch(setPage(getPageNum(i)));},children:getPageNum(i)},i);}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pagination.Item,{active:true,children:page}),Array(getNumPagesAfter()).fill(0).map(function(e,i){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pagination.Item,{onClick:function onClick(){return dispatch(setPage(page+i+1));},children:page+i+1},i);}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pagination.Next,{disabled:page===MAX_PAGES,onClick:function onClick(){return dispatch(setPage(page+1));}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pagination.Last,{onClick:function onClick(){return dispatch(setPage(MAX_PAGES));}})]})});};export default PageNav;
